abstract: Five young men are arrested in San Antonio, Tex, in connection with a break-in at Bexar County Courthouse, that raised fears of terror plot, but appears to be a prank.
snippet: Some of the men were captured on surveillance cameras running through a hallway wearing Mexican sombreros that they took from a law library and also playing with a courtroom gavel.
lead_paragraph: Some of the men were captured on surveillance cameras running through a hallway wearing Mexican sombreros that they took from a law library and also playing with a courtroom gavel.

headline.main: Texas Courthouse Break-In Seen as Prank
headline.print_headline: Texas Courthouse Break-In Seen as Prank
headline.seo: 5 Held in Break-In at San Antonio Courthouse
